game.name: The Elquest | The Legend of Immortal Dremond
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Uncover the past of the ancient wizard who doomed the world and find the path to save it! Join Prince Hideki's journey, meet new allies and win every battle to prevent a terrible future.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Uncover the past of the ancient wizard who doomed the world and find the path to save it! Join Prince Hideki's journey, meet new allies and win every battle to prevent a terrible future.
